data.title: Vestal Transom Watch
data.description:
[ VESTAL TRANSOM: WATERPROOF ]
The Transom Waterproof has a clean, fashionable and ultra-thin design enabling the watch to be worn comfortably under a wetsuit while surfing or under a dress shirt while at work. The Transom’s slim design makes it very light weight and at 6.5mm thick it is the thinnest metal case in our collection. Its case is made of solid marine grade stainless steel coupled with a mineral crystal creating a combination that increases water resistance in and out of the water. The 24mm wide polyurethane custom strap includes our patent pending OKTOLOK technology securing the strap to your wrist.

SPECIFICATIONS:
CASE: 42MM WIDE 316L STAINLESS STEEL 
BAND: 24MM WIDE POLYURETHANE
BUCKLE: STAINLESS STEEL
CRYSTAL: HARDENED MINERAL
MOVEMENT: 12 HOUR PREMIUM DIGITAL WITH DATE
WATER RESISTANCE: WATER PROOF
WRIST: MEDIUM
OTHER:
EL BACKLIGHT
ULTRA THIN
WATERPROOF

data.title: Vestal Roosevelt Watch
data.description:
[ VESTAL ROOSEVELT WATCH ]
The Roosevelt is a signature Vestal timepiece with its clean slim line case and straightforward dial. The premium 3 hand Japanese analog movement with date rests inside a multi-layered 42mm 316L solid stainless steel case. Laser-cut indexes then reveal a multi-layer dial that creates a unique design contrast for illuminating the hour markings. The 20mm wide genuine leather strap is integrated into the case with no lugs allowing the watch to hug your wrist and completing a clean and precise overall look and feel.

SPECIFICATIONS:
CASE: 42MM WIDE 316L STAINLESS STEEL 
BAND: 20MM WIDE PREMIUM GENUINE LEATHER
BUCKLE: STAINLESS STEEL
CRYSTAL: HARDENED MINERAL
MOVEMENT: 3-HAND PREMIUM ANALOG WITH DATE. MADE IN JAPAN
WATER RESISTANCE: 5 ATM / 50 METERS
WRIST: MEDIUM
OTHER::
MULTI-LAYER CASE
NO-LUG CONSTRUCTION
MULTI-LAYER DIAL
DATE WINDOW

data.title: Vestal Heirloom Leather Watch
data.description:
[ VESTAL HEIRLOOM LEATHER WATCH ]
The Heirloom Leather features a premium Japanese analog quartz movement, encompassed by 39mm case crafted from 316L surgical-grade stainless steel. The traditional detailing on the dial is evident in the solid, thick metal hour markers, double-printed minute track, and lume-filled hour & minute hands - giving the Heirloom Leather a classic, antique look. The Heirloom Leather has a water resistance rating of 10 ATM/100 meters, but it is recommended not to expose your leather strap to water. The solid stainless steel case is paired with an 18mm genuine calfskin leather strap with stainless steel buckle. The case has a built-in crown guard to protect the crown from accidental snags adding to the long lasting benefits.
SPECIFICATIONS:::
CASE: 39MM WIDE STAINLESS STEEL. 
BAND: 18MM WIDE GENUINE CALFSKIN LEATHER. 
BUCKLE: STAINLESS STEEL
CRYSTAL: HARDENED MINERAL
MOVEMENT: 3-HAND PREMIUM ANALOG MIYOTA. MADE IN JAPAN
WATER RESISTANCE: 10 ATM / 100 METERS
WRIST: MEDIUM
vestalwatch.com

data.title: Vestal Digichord Watch
data.description:
[ VESTAL DIGICHORD WATCH ]
The Digichord is Vestal’s thinnest and most lightweight watch. The 41mm wide polycarbonate case is only 5.5 millimeters at its thickest point. That’s not much thicker than a couple compact discs. The 24mm wide polyurethane strap with locking keeper holds the ultra-thin watch to your wrist. It’s so lightweight that if you didn’t get so many compliments while wearing it then you’d forget you had it on.
SPECIFICATIONS:::
CASE: 41MM WIDE ABS PLASTIC
BAND: 24MM WIDE POLYURETHANE WITH LOCKING KEEPER
BUCKLE: STAINLESS STEEL
CRYSTAL: PMMA PLASTIC
MOVEMENT: 12 HOUR PREMIUM DIGITAL WITH DATE. MADE IN JAPAN
WATER RESISTANCE: SPLASH RESISTANT
WRIST: MEDIUM
OTHER: BACKLIGHT
vestalwatch.com

data.title: Vestal ZR-2 Watch
data.description:
[ VESTAL ZR-2 WATCH ]
Inspired by its sibling, the ZR-2 is everything the ZR-3 has to offer while captured in a smaller 43mm case. The ZR-2 is a mid-sized premium round chronograph. Its stainless steel case construction includes an extra thick raised crystal seated in an angular fixed bezel and screw-down logo plate. These features together with a crown guard and protective pusher design add to its sophisticated yet retro styling. The ZR-2 is finished with a vintage inspired three-link bracelet and a premium butterfly deployant clasp.

SPECIFICATIONS:
CASE: 43MM WIDE STAINLESS STEEL. 316L SURGICAL GRADE
BAND: 19.5MM WIDE STAINLESS STEEL. 316L SURGICAL GRADE
BUCKLE: STAINLESS STEEL BUTTERFLY DEPLOYANT
CRYSTAL: SOLID MINERAL
MOVEMENT: 6-HAND PREMIUM CHRONOGRAPH. MADE IN JAPAN
WATER RESISTANCE: 10 ATM / 100 METERS
WRIST: MEDIUM
